name: OnGameModeInit
notes: This function can also be used in a filterscript to detect if the gamemode changes with RCON commands like changemode or gmx, as changing the gamemode does not reload a filterscript.
description: This callback is triggered when the gamemode starts.
related_cb:
OnGameModeExit: Called when a gamemode ends.
 OnFilterScriptInit: Called when a filterscript is loaded.
 OnFilterScriptExit: Called when a filterscript is unloaded.
